items.summary: Add a new "Customer Name" input field to the Laundry Price Calculator order flow UI, captured in component state and displayed alongside the existing contact number and pickup/delivery address fields.

Validate the new Customer Name field on the client and prevent sending a WhatsApp order unless Customer Name, Contact Number, and Pickup/Delivery Address are provided; show a clear English inline validation message for the Customer Name field when invalid.

Include the captured Customer Name in the prefilled WhatsApp message generated for the order, together with the existing customer contact number, address, line items, and grand total, while keeping the WhatsApp destination number as +917248903366.
